Author: rachihc
Text: Well I understand your feeling but I do think they genuinely think you are eating healthy, I mean veggies and fruit, chicken, non process food is healthier in the adequate amounts. but that is not really why is chosen and the right amount and that is the real issue. I have no idea how much it was but most people have zero clue when it comes to calorie counting or are just plain brainwashed of what diet culture has show everyone "this is your ideal meal" which pretty much is a reflection of r/1200isplenty delusional thinking. Maybe you can ask them to stop commenting on your food habits, that it makes you feel odd, no need to explain why. You say there are nice people, they sure will understand.
